Text: i dont know... im kinda scared downloading 1.4 GB with no description or comments
guys.. pls download it.. we want Seeds.. we want seeds

This is working fine for me. The program installs without problem ( as long as you read the README.TXT ) and all the books are complete.

Thanks Uploader.
i can't figure out how to install. plz help!!!

Every time i try to run METT-Program-Player.exe it tells me: 
"Please insert the correct CD-Rom, slect OK and restart application."
what CD-ROM???

First you should mount the METT.iso (located into the Micro Expression's folder) with a read's iso software (I used Daemon Tool) or burn it with a CD. Then, when the Autoplay options appear, don't run it from it, explore the folder. Locate the "METT-Program-Player.exe" and if you have Win7 (in my case) or Vista, I guess, run it as Windows XP SP3 [right click>properties>compatibility>compatibility mode>Windows XP (Service Pack 3)].

This worked for me, I hope for you too. Thanks for the uploaded.
